column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////After having the Spicy Creamy Vegan Ramen
column2: I kind of understand why this restaurant has such a good rating... IT'S THE BEST VEGAN FOOD I'VE EVER HAD. The broth itself is already amazing; I thought vegetable broth would not be as tasty as Tonkotsu (Pork Broth)
